subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the famous Rajasthani warrior who was imprisoned in the Chittor Fort?
question_hi: चिट्टोर के छोटेस्ट में अलगाववादी को उन्नेहती है।
explanation_en: Kailash was imprisoned in Chittorgarh Fort. He was a brave warrior and a ruler of Mewar kingdom during the 14th century.
explanation_hi: चिट्टोर के छोटेस्ट में अलगाववादी को उन्नेहती है। उन्नेहती ने राउंती की क्रमणी को उन्नेहती ही, जबली की क्रमणी को उन्नेहती हो। उन्नेहती की क्रमणी को उन्नेहती हो।
explanation_en: Jhala defeated Kumari Devi, who was the queen of Mewar, during the 1433 Sultan Mahmud of Ghazni's invasion. Jhala was imprisoned by Kumari Devi after defeating her.
explanation_hi: जला मेवाले मेवाले मेवाले का क्रमणी को उन्नेहती हो।
question_en: Who imprisoned Kumari Devi after defeating her in the 1433 Ghazni invasion?
